questions.correct: jack o'lantern & jackolantern & jack-o-lantern & jack o lantern & jack o' lantern & jack-o'-lantern
questions.explanation:
jack o'lantern & jackolantern & jack-o-lantern & jack o lantern & jack o' lantern & jack-o'-lantern.

	The Irish used to hollow out potatoes, beets, turnips, and such to make lanterns for scaring away "Stingy Jack," a wandering ghost. In America, Irish immigrants discovered that pumpkins made the best jack o'lanterns--easier to hollow out and carve.

trick or treat.

	Trick or treating, too, probably began in Ireland. People would go from door to door asking for contributions for a communal feast to be held on All Hallow's Eve.

bobbing for apples.

	People do this at Halloween parties.

costume parties.

	Write and tell me about the most original Halloween costumes you've seen or worn, and I'll add them in here. My boyfriend saw someone dressed as a Monopoly board and someone dressed as a green salad! When player sophia_jr was in college, she saw a girl dressed as a dinner for two. She created a table with a red-and-white checked cloth and glued on place settings. She even used a battery-operated candle to create romantic lighting.

questions.correct: witch's broom & witchs broom & witches broom & witches' broom
questions.explanation:
witch's broom & witchs broom & witches broom & witches' broom.

	Harry Potter fans can relate. By the way, a brougham is a kind of horse-drawn carriage. You pronounce it BREW um.

questions.correct: black and orange & orange and black & black orange & black, orange
questions.explanation:
black and orange & orange and black & black orange & black, orange.

	Purple seems to have become a popular Halloween color, too. In Los Angeles, people put up purple Halloween lights on their homes. They're pretty and eerie.

candy corn.

	I love to bite off one color at a time--white, yellow, and orange.

questions.correct: witches and wizards & wizards and witches
questions.explanation:
witches and wizards & wizards and witches.

	Harry Potter fans can nominate their favorites, and I'll add them in here. My favorite witch-in-training is Hermione Granger. Player egyptmysteries favors Fred and George Weasley, Ron's twin brothers, and SonShine77 loves Ron himself. Hillbilly_69er likes Malfoy "because he is cunning and evil."

Happy Halloween & Happy Halloween!.

	Thanks for playing and have a safe and happy Halloween.
